articles.title: Haverhill Culina warehouse death: Inquest opens - East Anglian Daily Times
articles.description: Workers at a Haverhill warehouse have told an inquest how they saw their colleague being crushed by pallets after a forklift collision.
articles.content:
Workers at a Haverhill warehouse have told an inquest how they saw their colleague being crushed by pallets after a forklift collision.
